title: Taste the Prisoner
description:
Join us on Wednesday, October 29, from 4–8 PM at Whispering Vine Fourth Street for a special Halloween editionof Flights & Flatbread featuring The Prisoner Wine Company. This festive evening will be hosted by Drew Schneider, National Brand Manager, and includes a costume competition and raffle prizes—with the grand prize being a magnum of The Prisoner Red Blend. Enjoy an evening of bold wines, delicious flatbread, and a little mischief—perfect for spooky season.

Reserve your Spot

Tasting Fee: $30 (Includes a flatbread and a raffle ticket)

Night-of Specials: 10% off bottles • 15% off cases

Featured Wines:

• The Prisoner Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 – 93 pts Tasting Panel, 90 pts James Suckling, 90 pts Wine Enthusiast – Rich and structured with layers of plum, cocoa, cassis, and coffee framed by fine tannins and dark spice.

• The Prisoner Red Blend 2022 – Lush and velvety with ripe raspberry, pomegranate, vanilla, and hints of dark chocolate for a smooth, lingering finish.

• The Prisoner Chardonnay 2021 – Creamy and complex with notes of apricot, peach, vanilla, and lemon zest balanced by bright acidity.

• The Prisoner Pinot Noir 2022 – Expressive and elegant with cranberry, black cherry, mocha, and warm spice over a supple, silky palate.

Come sip, savor, and “Taste the Prisoner”—a Halloween night filled with great wine, prizes, and a chance to win big. Don’t forget your costume!
